tool_description: Social platform site established by Twitter founder Jack Dorsey as an alternative to Twitter.
name: BlueSky API | by Jack Dorsey
title: BlueSky API | by Jack Dorsey

api_list.name: Get Post Thread
Get User Follows
Get Reposts
Get Post Likers
Get Followers
Get BlueSky Team Posts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bluesky-api-by-jack-dorsey.p.rapidapi.com/get_bluesky_team_posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bluesky-api-by-jack-dorsey.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bluesky-api-by-jack-dorsey.p.rapidapi.com/get_bluesky_team_posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
